fields_of_interest: Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
The Aviation Strategy for Europe, including work flowing from the Strategy such as the review of airport charges, Regulation 868 and Regulation 1008/2008 
The UK's exit from the EU
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: Events and one-to-one meetings with MEPs, UKRep and EU Commission stakeholders.
goals__remit: The Airport Operators Association (AOA) is the trade association that represents UK airports. Its mission is to see UK airports grow sustainably. It represents the views of UK airports to Government, Parliament and Regulators to secure policy outcomes that help deliver our mission. The AOA represents some 50+ UK airports in the UK. For more information, please visit www.aoa.org.uk.
